title: OCE Pro Top 5 Plays #4 - Every Mid Needs a Le Blanc

embed.description: 1 points and 0 comments so far on reddit

body:
Episode 4 of the Top 5 pro plays OCE is out, enjoy!

edit; linked to the reddit post. You can just get the video [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VP1PYMc3nNE&feature=youtu.be)
~J

replies.body:
Hey Jason,

Nice job I really enjoyed it. 
You'd make a great shoutcaster!
Can you cast that well free, or only scripted? It would be amazing if you could cast like that live. 

Anyway thanks for the cool watch,
Skyprus

> [{quoted}](name=Skyprus,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=0Yvp15aF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-25T09:38:57.791+0000)
>
> Hey Jason,
> 
> Nice job I really enjoyed it. 
> You'd make a great shoutcaster!
> Can you cast that well free, or only scripted? It would be amazing if you could cast like that live. 
> 
> Anyway thanks for the cool watch,
> Skyprus

it's actually the opposite. I'm a natural shoutcaster, and doing scripted stuff is so hard, because shoutcasting is so reactionary and on the fly.  When you know what you're supposed to say in really quick succession, there's a lot more practice and outtakes involved.

Glad you enjoyed :)
